title: Dirty Energy’s Cute But Deadly Rebrand
description: Meet the White House’s newest mascot: Coalie. He’s a cute lump of coal that the administration hopes will sell its perverse energy agenda, says Bloomberg Opinion columnist Mark Gongloff. (Source: Bloomberg)
